paper_abstract: In this paper, we show that noise can transform a hybrid neural networks, whose solution may grow exponentially, into a new stochastic one, whose solution grows at most polynomially. In other words, we reveal that noise can suppress the exponential growth in hybrid Hopfield neural networks. (C) 2011 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Noise suppress exponential growth for hybrid Hopfield neural networks
